item.title: Firebase remote config rest 更新
item.description: Refer - Firebase Remote Config API 取用和更新都需要以下 Google oauth2.0 的權限 https://www.googleapis.com/auth/firebase.remoteconfig https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform
